pr_title: Implement basic version of getDatabase in catalog service

timeline.message:
implement basic getDatabase

Note here getDatabase returns an object that only contains the database name.
A subsequent PR will add more content into this database object.

timeline.author: ZacBlanco
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -196,6 +196,19 @@ private Table getTableInternal(String dbName, String tableName) throws IOExcepti
     return new ArrayList<>(mDBs.keySet());
   }
 
+  /**
+   * Get Database by its name.
+   *
+   * @param dbName database name
+   * @return a databae object

timeline.bodyText: won't this stop the rest of the test from being run?
timeline.author: ZacBlanco

replies.bodyText: doh.. why aren't we on Junit 5 yet?  I totally misunderstood the semantics of expect
replies.author: yuzhu

timeline.bodyText: similarly, won't all lines after this not be executed?
timeline.author: ZacBlanco

timeline.bodyText: i don't care that much but for the most part methods are in alphabetical order in this class. Should we try to keep it that way? the transform methods are obviously not in the right order, but the rest seem to be
timeline.author: ZacBlanco
